pr_title: Fix crash upon loading resumable episodes without runtime field

timeline.message: Fix crash upon loading resumable episodes without runtime field

timeline.bodyText: Should this still check for canResume?
timeline.author: thornbill

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure if this also affects the details screen or item playback - if it doesn't then I guess that check wouldn't make a difference. I can't test that at the moment unfortunately.
replies.author: sachk
